code: public LoadBalancingPolicy getLoadBalancingPolicy(String policy) {     LoadBalancingPolicy loadBalancingPolicy = new RoundRobinPolicy().     switch(policy) {         case roundRobinPolicy:             loadBalancingPolicy = new RoundRobinPolicy().             break.         case tokenAwarePolicy:             loadBalancingPolicy = new TokenAwarePolicy(new RoundRobinPolicy()).             break.         case dcAwareRoundRobinPolicy:             loadBalancingPolicy = DCAwareRoundRobinPolicy.builder().build().             break.         case latencyAwarePolicy:             loadBalancingPolicy = LatencyAwarePolicy.builder(new RoundRobinPolicy()).build().             break.         case errorAwarePolicy:             loadBalancingPolicy = ErrorAwarePolicy.builder(new RoundRobinPolicy()).build().             break.         default:             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cassandra load balancing policy can be " + roundRobinPolicy + " ," + tokenAwarePolicy + " ," + dcAwareRoundRobinPolicy).     }     return loadBalancingPolicy. }
